content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Steam Power Generation System (Boiler Zone) at (8.0, 20.5)
Consists of the following entities:
– Boiler at (8.0, 20.5)  
 • Role: Produces steam fueled by coal  
 • Status: WORKING; Fuel: {'coal': 8}
– Extra Steam Engine at (11.5, 18.5)  
 • Role: Converts steam to electrical energy  
 • Status: NOT_CONNECTED; Energy: 0.0
– Offshore Pump at (1.5, 32.5)  
 • Role: Supplies water to the boiler  
 • Status: WORKING; Connected via a pipe group using 24 pipes

### Iron Ore Mining Operation at (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
– Burner Mining Drill at (-15.0, -50.0)  
 • Function: Extracts iron ore  
 • Status: WORKING; Fuel: {'coal': 7}; Energy produced: 2666.67  
 • Drop position: (-14.5, -48.5)

### Wooden Chest Storage Unit at (-19.5, -54.5)
Consists of the following entity:
– WoodenChest at (-19.5, -54.5)

(ERROR: Note that repeated logs confirm the WoodenChest is placed at (-19.5, -54.5) without introducing a new structure.)

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
• WoodenChest Placement in Obstructed Zones  
 – Extended search attempts in candidate zones have repeatedly encountered obstructions. Ensure manual clearance before placement.
• Risky Automated Clearance Operations  
 – Automated removals have eliminated adjacent critical components. Confirm the importance of nearby entities prior to clearance.
• Inconsistent Candidate Zone Selection  
 – Multiple candidate positions have been flagged as obstructed. Enhance detection to differentiate non‐critical clutter from key structures.
• Incorrect Invocation of Position Object  
 – Access Position properties directly rather than invoking them to avoid TypeError.
• Redundant Placement Attempts  
 – Multiple placement actions for the WoodenChest at (-19.5, -54.5) were initiated. Verify the existence of a structure before attempting placement to prevent inventory or spatial conflicts.
• Inconsistent Execution Log References  
 – Execution log summary messages reference prior step numbers inconsistently. Maintain consistent step numbering for clearer debugging.

NAMESPACE
────────────────────────────
get_connection_amount(boiler: Entity, extra_se: Entity, connection_type: Prototype) -> int  
 – Determines the required number of pipes to connect two entities; raises an exception if connectivity or spatial conditions are not met.

place_entity(entity_type: Prototype, position: Position, direction: Direction) -> Entity  
 – Attempts to place an entity of the specified type at a given position and orientation; fails if the tile is occupied or if the necessary item is absent from inventory.

craft_item(item: Prototype, quantity: int) -> int  
 – Initiates crafting for a specified item and quantity; throws an exception if essential sub-ingredients or an operational production facility is missing.

Important Variables:
• inventory: dict[str, int] — Represents the current inventory.
• boiler: Entity — Refers to the boiler at (8.0, 20.5).
• extra_se: Entity — Denotes the extra steam engine at (11.5, 18.5).
• new_buildable_area: BuildableArea — Utility used to determine available buildable regions.
